channel.title: Fun Fun Vietnam
channel.description: A space to share how I have learnt about Vietnam

item.title: List of airports in Vietnam
item.description: How many airports in Vietnam? Five or six? As a foreigner, I’ve heard several cities which famous in tourism. For example, Hà Nội, Hồ Chí Minh, Đà Nẵng, Hải Phòng…...

item.title: Holidays in Vietnam in 2019
item.description: Public holidays in Vietnam are days when workers get the day off work. Vietnamese workers observed 10 days of public holiday a year. If you are planing a vocation to...

item.title: Interesting custom on Vietnamese Lunar New Year
item.description: Vietnam is one of the country whose people use lunar calendar for their important days. For example, the date of Vietnamese New Year is on 1st, January in lunar calendar....

item.title: National Cinema Center at Hanoi, Vietnam
item.description: Want to see a movie at Hanoi? If you lookup on Google Map, you must found that the popluar cniemas in Vietnam are CGV cinema and Lotte cinema. Both of...

item.title: Use Google Sheets to make your own dictionary
item.description: If you have experience to lookup Vietnamese words in English dictionary, you must be noticed that the quality of the translation is often unsatisfied. Let’s look deeply in this problem...

item.title: How I learnt Vietnamese - part 2

item.title: How I learnt Vietnamese
